name: VBase
description:
A small little game about war & battles, Please enjoy! Btw you need a controller to play coop.

CONTROLS:

WASD To Move

LMB To Shoot

SPACE To Enable Build Mode

E To Place Walls

RMB To Rotate Build

GAMEPAD CONTROLS:

LEFT JOYSTICK To Move

RT To Shoot

LB To Enable Build Mode

RB To Disable Build Mode

LEFT JOYSTICK BUTTON & RIGHT JOYSTICK BUTTON To Rotate Build

A To Place Walls
